title: Integrated Multilingual Image Processing
description: Developed a multilingual text recognition system using a custom Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) model, improving text detection accuracy by 30%. Applied transfer learning using pre-trained models (e.g., VGG, Inception) as feature extractors, increasing accuracy by 15% and elevating the confidence score for character recognition.

title: Alzheimer’s Disease Classification
description: Developed a deep learning model to classify Alzheimer’s disease severity into four stages, achieving a 98.20% validation accuracy using CNNs and data augmentation techniques. Enhanced model performance through transfer learning with VGG16, fine-tuning pre-trained layers, and optimizing the architecture with dropout and dense layers.

title: A Machine Learning Technique for Identification of Plant Diseases in Leaves
description: Developed an ML-based system using texture analysis (GLCM) and K-Means Clustering to classify plant leaf images into four categories with 94.12% accuracy. Processed 1,908 leaf images, extracting features like contrast and energy for disease prediction using Support Vector Machine (SVM) and K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN).

title: Customer Segmentation Using Machine Learning
description: Implemented a clustering-based approach for customer segmentation using transaction data. Extracted Recency, Frequency, and Monetary (RFM) features and applied K-Means clustering to identify distinct customer groups.

title: Sentiment Analysis Using Machine Learning
description: Built a machine learning pipeline for sentiment analysis using NLP techniques. Preprocessed text data, applied TF-IDF vectorization, and trained models such as Logistic Regression, Naïve Bayes, and SVM to classify sentiments.

title: DeepSeek in Colab
description: Demonstrated how to run DeepSeek Coder models in Google Colab for code generation and completion tasks. Implemented transformers-based models for generating and infilling code in multiple programming languages.

title: Stock Analysis and Prediction Using LSTM
description: Developed a time-series forecasting model using LSTM to predict stock prices based on historical data. Applied data preprocessing, feature scaling, and hyperparameter tuning to improve model accuracy.

title: Face Mask Detection
description: Designed a deep learning-based model for detecting face masks in images. Used OpenCV for image processing and a CNN-based classifier trained on labeled datasets to identify masked and unmasked faces.
